title: Cluster Spacecraft 4, JSOC Predicted Magnetic Positions - M. Hapgood (RAL)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch__C4_JP_PMP' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/cluster/c4/jp/pmp/2000/c4_jp_pmp_20000814_v03.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 4936 timesteps. Cadence = 300000 [ms] = PT5M.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Interval centred time tag rounded to nearest msecond

parameters.name: Invar_Lat__C4_JP_PMP
parameters.description: Spacecraft invariant Latitude (Null/will not plot outside magnetosphere)

parameters.name: Mag_Local_time__C4_JP_PMP
parameters.description: Spacecraft local magnetic time in hours

parameters.name: L_value__C4_JP_PMP
parameters.description: Spacecraft L-value (Null/will not plot outside magnetosphere)

parameters.name: Pred_B_mag__C4_JP_PMP
parameters.description: Predicted magnetic field magnitude (Null/will not plot outside magnetosphere)
